RelatedSentence: After a stepped - up campaign to save Kever Dovid HaMelech along with increased tefilos around the world , MK Miri Regev announced the second floor of the tziyun is not going to be given to the Vatican .

Regev , who chairs the Knesset Internal Affairs Committee , announced that Public Security Minister Yitzchak Aharonovich told her there would not be any change in any portion of the tziyun complex during next week 's papal visit .
